Implementation Details

C Language Implementation

void print_matrix(int matrix[SIZE][SIZE]) { for (int i = 0; i < SIZE; i++) { for (int j = 0; j < SIZE; j++) { printf("%d\t", matrix[i][j]); } printf("\n"); } }
